Sentencas: The very low pressure plasma spray (VLPPS) process operates at a pressure range of approximately 100 Pa.
Titulo: Thin and Dense Ceramic Coatings by Plasma Spraying at Very Low Pressure

Sentencas: At this pressure, the plasma jet interaction with the surrounding atmosphere is very weak.
Titulo: Thin and Dense Ceramic Coatings by Plasma Spraying at Very Low Pressure

Sentencas: Thus, the plasma velocity is almost constant over a large distance from the nozzle exit.
Titulo: Thin and Dense Ceramic Coatings by Plasma Spraying at Very Low Pressure

Sentencas: Furthermore, at these low pressures the collision frequency is distinctly reduced and the mean free path is strongly increased.
Titulo: Thin and Dense Ceramic Coatings by Plasma Spraying at Very Low Pressure

Sentencas: As a consequence, at low pressure the specific enthalpy of the plasma is substantially higher, but at lower density.
Titulo: Thin and Dense Ceramic Coatings by Plasma Spraying at Very Low Pressure

Sentencas: These particular plasma characteristics offer enhanced possibilities to spray thin and dense ceramics compared to conventional processes which operate in the pressure range between 5 and 20 kPa.
Titulo: Thin and Dense Ceramic Coatings by Plasma Spraying at Very Low Pressure

Sentencas: This paper presents some examples of gas-tight and electrically insulating coatings with low thicknesses < 50 mu m for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Thin and Dense Ceramic Coatings by Plasma Spraying at Very Low Pressure

Sentencas: Furthermore, plasma spraying of oxygen conducting membrane materials such as perovskites is discussed.
Titulo: Thin and Dense Ceramic Coatings by Plasma Spraying at Very Low Pressure
